Windows.name: Windows
Windows.requirements: Windows 10 (version 1607) or newer (Intel or AMD processors only)
Windows.items_added:
(TerraMaster) Add ARMv8 platform support (PM-2349)
(Web) Updated to 4.146.0
Windows.items_fixed:
(Agents) Requests to legacy agents routes would fail (PM-3385)
(Continue Watching) Always return ancestor guids for in-progress items (PM-3303)
(Filters) The DOVI filter would result in an error when applied to a show library (PM-3272)
(Optimization) Conversion queue would stall after a single item (PM-3372)
(Requests) Requests with non-ascii characters could throw an exception on parsing (PM-3565)
(Transcode) Transcoding High Bitrate EAC-3 could result in choppy audio. (PM-691)
(Transcodes) Some transcodes could result in larger than required bitrates (PM-2772)
(Transcoding) Encoding to Dolby audio codecs could cause the Transcoder to crash. (PM-3561)
(Web) Unauthorized requests to / were not redirected to web (PM-3391)
(Western Digital) New installs of Plex Media Server would fail on OS 5 platforms. (PM-3358)

Drobo.name: Drobo
Drobo.items_added: Added DOVI filter to video libraries (PM-2122)
Drobo.items_fixed:
(Activities) The `metadataID` was not present in `media.download` activities (PM-2097)
(Continue Watching) Marking an item as played would not cause next episode to show in Continue Watching (PM-2643)
(Music) Local lyrics and extras for tracks would not get picked up (PM-3185)
(Performance) Loading media details screens can be slow when item is part of many collections (PM-2390)
(Transcoding) HW transcodes were still failing on some older intel igpus (PM-2756)
Improved the clarity of the Title and Description of the of "Include adult content" advanced library preference (PM-2601)
